alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 2:14AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...One More Round Of Snow, Wintry Mix This Morning... .As an area of moderate snow lifts northeast across northern Wisconsin, mostly north of Interstate 94, a brief break of an hour or two from the precipitation can be expected. Another area of snow to a wintry mix is quickly rotating northward out of Iowa however, returning one more round of precipitation. This area of mainly snow looks to shift north of Interstate 90 by mid morning, exiting into northern Wisconsin toward noon. Winds will continue drift snow, especially on ridge tops, higher terrain and open areas. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow with additional accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Brief period of a wintry mix possible which could deposit a light glaze of ice. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Minnesota and central, southwest and west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Minnesota, visit 511mn.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
